text: Gerard Milton Earnhart (April 1, 1918 â€“ June 6, 2020) was an American politician and broadcast journalist. He was a Democratic member of the Arkansas House of Representatives and Arkansas Senate from the years of 1959 to 1980. He was born in Pine Lawn, Missouri. Earnhart died on June 6, 2020 in Fort Smith, Arkansas at the age of 102.Milt Earnhart ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American centenarians Category:Politicians from Arkansas Category:Journalists from Arkansas Category:Politicians from Missouri Category:Journalists from Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Fort Smith, Arkansas
title: Milt Earnhart
